meaningMnemonic: You've seen 技 as a vocab word meaning "technique," and the kanji 術 means <kanji>technique</kanji>. So this means <vocabulary>technique</vocabulary>! Your technique is also your <vocabulary>craft</vocabulary>, and what’s needed for <vocabulary>technology</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
